algorithm_technique: Union-Find to track connected components and count redundant edges.
Depth First Search (DFS) to find connected components and count redundant edges.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum operations to connect all computers, moving cables between disconnected ones.
problem_summary_technical: Count connected components; if enough redundant cables exist, operations equal components - 1.
key_insights: The problem boils down to finding the number of connected components.
We need at least n-1 cables to connect n computers.
The number of operations is the number of components minus 1, provided there are enough spare cables.
